description: This Traditional Chinese Medicine herbal formula is known as "Ge Geng Tang," a classic recipe used for treating the common cold and flu. Ingredients include magnolia bark, Chinese almonds, fresh...
cleaned_text: Descripción Colección de hierbas ingredientes naturales como parte de una fórmula de tónico de hierbas utilizado en medicina tradicional China (MTC) para el resfriado o gripe.
